product_name: Patagonia  Baby Sun-Lite Hoodie Pullover - Infant/Toddler Girls'
long_description: The Baby Sun-Lite Hoodie pullover from Patagonia is made of soft polyester with an odor control finish to keep little ones feeling fresh while frolicking in the sun.
